titlestmt.titleproper:
Catalano Family Certificates
1910-1937
AHMC - Catalano Family
titlestmt.author: Larry Weimer

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 15:48:24 -0400.

did.abstract:
Four documents: Certificate of citizenship (1932) for immigrant from Italy, Charles Catalano of Brooklyn, N.Y. (grandfather of the donor), with photograph; Hospital birth certificate from Madison Park Hospital (1934) for Charles Catalano, Jr. (father of the donor), with footprints; Certificate of naturalization (1910) for immigrant from Italy, Giuseppe Di Stefano of Brooklyn, N.Y. (the donor's paternal grandmother's father); and a diphtheria protection certificate from the New York State Department of Health (1937) for Rose Marie Di Blasio, (the donor's mother).
To request this material for research, and for fuller information about it, please follow this link to the record in N-YHS's catalog, Bobcat: Catalano Family Certificates
did.langmaterial: The documents in the collection are in English.
